title: Technical Bits on Polyjuice
description: Polyjuice is an Ethereum compatible layer and has implemented most of the functions of Ethereum on CKB, including running an EVM contract on CKB-VM. We believe that we have achieved full-featured compatibility with the implementation of EVM,which is also the power of CKB-VM.By polyjuice we want to showcase that it is perfectly possible to use account model on Nervos CKB. The flexibility here actually enables countless opportunities.
